issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Supports protecting and expanding the Affordable Care Act, reducing prescription drug costs, and defending coverage for pre-existing conditions

issues.title: Infrastructure Investment
issues.description: Advocates for major infrastructure spending to repair roads, bridges, and expand broadband access in rural areas

issues.title: Abortion Rights
issues.description: Strong pro-choice advocate, supports codifying Roe v. Wade protections and women's reproductive healthcare access

issues.title: Climate Change Action
issues.description: Supports clean energy investments, reducing carbon emissions, and transitioning to renewable energy sources

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Advocates for increased federal education funding, student debt relief, and expanded vocational training programs

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform with pathway to citizenship and border security enhancements

issues.title: Veterans Support
issues.description: Committed to expanding veterans' healthcare, mental health services, and job training programs
